This site is all about stories; good, bad, so bad they're good, and so on. I'll be posting reviews of shows, films, games, and books that I've devoured (willingly or not). My critiques are systematic, going over all the different nuances to why said story or tale was bad or brilliant. I'll also be posting stories of my own. Short stories, screenplays ... maybe novels. Who knows? But at the very least I'll be making things up and posting them on here. *Constructive* feedback is appreciated. And finally, there's a blog. This may have some story related stuff, but my focus on it will be non-fictional works, philosophy, and odd ponderings.
